statements: DELETE FROM EquipmentMaintenanceSchedule WHERE equipment_id = 101 AND maintenance_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM EquipmentMaintenanceSchedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Scheduled' AND estimated_cost > 1000;
DELETE FROM equipment WHERE equipment_id = 100 AND serial_number = 'SN12345';
DELETE FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Preventive Maintenance' AND technician_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM operational_costs WHERE equipment_id = 201 AND maintenance_cost > 500;
DELETE FROM downtime_logs WHERE equipment_id = 2002 AND downtime_start < '2022-01-01';
